name: test_CMS_213_Delete_From_Three_Dots_Menu
description:
Test Case 213: Verify ability to delete notification from 3 dots menu.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Notifications page
4. Check for unread notifications
5. If no unread notifications, switch to Read tab
6. Delete notification from 3 dots menu
7. Verify notification is deleted successfully
